column5: Did anyone see this last night? If so do you really think he was on drugs and high or was he just trying out a new character for an upcoming film? Plus his looks are pretty freaky, beard, glasses and all.   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lG-M1CWskeQ  Dirk...
i think hes acting it up.. just a promo... check the end... he pretty much jumps out of character and starts yapping w/ letterman.
Thanks for that  Letterman is a master !  TB
yeah he had me going for a while, maybe it was my own use! ...... He is an actor!
I think it's pretty close as to what people are thinking, I'd say 50/50....from talking with people today.  Letterman has some classic lines......

That was funny.    I think he was having everybody on.     He was trying not to laugh a few times.     He said maniacal way to clearly when teasing Paul Schaffer.      Sounds kinda like a Kaufman gig to me.  Got their website a bunch of hits though and they are getting pretty good face on the news.  Pretty good stuff.
This guy is one of the best I have seen in a long tme. I hated this guy in the movie Glatiator. But after he did,Walk the line,that was SO COOL.  A real ACTOR.
Hey! That describes 50% of the members here including you and me!
yeah I don't know if it was an act or not if it was an act, he needs to be given the oscar
he just looks like he didn't want to be there .

It's a sad commentary really. Have seen several people from my past including a couple good friends get messed up and they are only a portion of their former selves. Another thing is that many of them were exceptionally talented. Hopefully it was an act on his part. It would be a shame to have a talent such as his ruined.

When Letterman asked him what type of music he was doing and he said Hip Hop I was almost crying I was laughing so hard.  It seemed too well set up not to be a joke.  I hope he wasn't all high and stuff.   It would be pretty sad if it was the truth.  But again I am suspicious, it was all too well set up and he said "maniacal laughter" perfectly.
If that was serious we'll be reading about him in the obituaries pretty soon.  oh and that link has been removed now, this one is up though;  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x1IncP6xjfg
Apparently his appearance etc is an act.  It is part of a mockumentary being filmed by Casey Affleck, Ben Afflecks younger brother.  http://celebedge.ca/Dramarama/ContentPosti...'''
